text: Maurice Glynne was a Welsh Anglican priest in the 16th century.Dictionary of West Biography Meyrick was educated at the University of Oxford.Alumni Oxonienses 1500-1714, Gilpin-Greenhaugh He was Archdeacon of Bangor from 1504 until his death in 1525."Fasti Ecclesiæ Anglicanæ from the First Erection Thereof to this Present Year 1715" p29: London; J.Nutt; 1716 Glynne was appointed an advocate of Doctors Commons on 21 July, 1517. ==References== Category:Alumni of the University of Oxford Category:Archdeacons of Bangor Category:16th-century Welsh people
title: Maurice Glynne
